summary: Set of my various works and retextures
descriptionHtml:
Attention. This set of textures is intended for experienced users, those who can independently look and choose textures which are necessary. It's not full and self-sufficient textures pack, it recommended for use in a combination with other mods and retextures. These textures are only additions and options for creation of global retexture from works of different authors.
Resolution of most files - 2048x2048, normal maps - 2048x2048 (landscape) or 1024x1024. No any upscaling (sharpness increase) of original textures. Some fragments and separate parts of textures are borrowed from other mods.

Installation: choose the necessary textures or choose everything. Installation textures and meshes folders in the game Data folder.

Credits:
Fixed mesh of nordic tent, and help with normal maps by vova2112v.
Pelts textures for tent by Gamwish.
Fringe of carpets from mod Detailed Rugs by raiserfx.
Smelter model by Renegade1979.
Dirt, snow and ash textures from Serious HD Retexture Skyrim by Z4G4. These files have been taken to ensure compatibility with the textures of roads.
Also separate small fragments from mods, the name and authors didn't manage to be found out, are used.


[b]Update 26.05.15

[/b]New or renew files.
Warning! I write only texture name, but don't forget normal maps associated with texture. Same file name with _n.
* All textures dwemer's metal from http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35608/?Â 
* Textures for High Hrotghar textures\architecture\highhrothgar
* Doors in Solitude textures\architecture\Solitude\sdoor02.dds
* Stone steps and slabs in Solitude textures\architecture\Solitude\ssteps01.dds \ssteps02.dds \sstonefloortrim01.dds
* Trellis and railing in Whiterun and Solitude textures\architecture\Solitude\swooddet01.dds textures\architecture\Whiterun\wrtrellisvines01.dds
* Minor fix in carpet textures textures\architecture\Whiterun\wrcarpet01.dds \wrcarpetdetails01.dds
* Castle carvings textures\architecture\Whiterun\wrcastlecarvings.dds
* Temple floor and a bench texture textures\architecture\Whiterun\wrtemplefloor01.dds
* Beams and carving on beams in Whiterun textures\architecture\Whiterun\wrtrims01.dds \wrwoodbeam02.dds and thirsk textures\dlc02\architecture\thirsk\meadhall.
* Doors in Windhelm textures\architecture\Windhelm\whdoor01.dds
* Tombstones in Windhelm textures\architecture\Windhelm\whtombstone.dds
* Big and small nordic tents meshes\architecture\tents textures\architecture\tents (warning! don't forget meshes folder)
* Interior roof in farmhouse textures\architecture\farmhouse\thatchinterior01.dds
* Ship's wood floor textures\dungeons\ships\shipwoodfloor01.dds \shipwoodfloor02.dds and metal shipdragonmetal01.dds shipgoldenmetal01.dds
* Texture for the dragon burial textures\effects\fxdirtmound01.dds
* Tongs, caves lamp, crates, iron, dwemer clutter, kettle textures\clutter
* Stockade and wood detail in forts textures\clutter\stockade
* Removed some not relevant or obsolete files.

Small nordic tents have 3 variants. If you want other variant - rename files 1_smallnordtent.dds or 2_smallnordtent.dds in smallnordtent.dds.
author: Langley
